description:
CoolConfig ensures problem-free copying and storing of settings.

The CoolConfig tool allows the project engineer to generate the settings for the EKE 400/450 evaporator controller, IPS 8 Air Purger, LLS 400 or ICAD B offline, and hand over the file to the commissioning engineer at the appropriate time for the installation. It also allows the commissioning engineer to download the settings from these devices already installed at a job-site and modify and store these on a PC.
Features and benefits:
- Easily setup or modify the settings of an EKE 400/450 evaporator controller, IPS 8 Air Purger, LLS 4000 or ICAD B on a PC.
- Easily upload the settings to multiple EKE 400/450 evaporator controllers, IPS 8 Air Purger, LLS 4000 or ICAD B.
- Easily download settings from an EKE 400/450 evaporator controller, IPS 8 Air Purger, LLS 4000 or ICAD B installed at a job site and store on a PC.
